title: Bug 115442Styles in themes can't be applied to a report.
description: Description: Styles in themes can't be applied to a report.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Bug 115442Styles in themes can't be applied to a report. Pull down style list.Actual result: style names are not displayed in list and it can't be appliedin this report.
SR: Create a library file and add a theme in it.2. Add some styles in the theme.3. Include this library in a design file.4. Select a theme in property editor.5.
